profile_summary:
As a Cloud Engineer with 8 years of experience, I excel in cloud infrastructure management and automation encompassing **AWS**, **Azure**, and **GCP**. My robust skill set includes implementing **Terraform** for infrastructure as code, orchestrating containerized applications using **Kubernetes**, and ensuring seamless CI/CD pipelines through **Jenkins** and **Git**. I possess expertise in cloud security practices and leverage monitoring tools to safeguard cloud environments.
In addition to these core skills, I am a seasoned Full Stack Developer proficient in **Python**, **Node.js**, and modern frontend technologies like **React**, **Next.js**, and **Vue**. I have led the design and implementation of secure, high-performance applications across the healthcare and financial sectors, integrating AI/ML capabilities for predictive analytics and real-time operations. My extensive experience with microservices architecture and event-driven systems complements my background in developing machine learning pipelines and MLOps workflows utilizing tools like **MLflow** and **Airflow**.
